match.match_expr: ( (job.get("DESIRED_Sites","nosite")=="nosite") or (glidein["attrs"]["GLIDEIN_Site"] in job.get("DESIRED_Sites","nosite").split(",")) ) and ( (job.get("XENON_DESIRED_Sites","nosite")=="nosite") or (glidein["attrs"]["GLIDEIN_Site"] in job.get("XENON_DESIRED_Sites","nosite").split(",")) ) and ( (job.get("UNDESIRED_Sites","nosite")=="nosite") or (glidein["attrs"]["GLIDEIN_Site"] not in job.get("UNDESIRED_Sites","nosite").split(",")) ) and ( int(glidein["attrs"]["GLIDEIN_MaxMemMBs"] or 0) == 0 or job.get("RequestMemory", 1024) <= int(glidein["attrs"]["GLIDEIN_MaxMemMBs"] or 0) ) and ( job.get("SingularityImage", "") == "" or glidein["attrs"].get("GLIDEIN_SINGULARITY_REQUIRE", "OPTIONAL") != "NEVER" )
match.start_expr: (isUndefined(MY.OSG_NODE_VALIDATED) || MY.OSG_NODE_VALIDATED) && (isUndefined(IsBlackHole) || IsBlackHole == False) && (isUndefined(HasExcessiveLoad) || HasExcessiveLoad == False) && ((DESIRED_Sites=?=undefined) || stringListMember(GLIDEIN_Site,DESIRED_Sites,",")) && ((UNDESIRED_Sites=?=undefined) || !stringListMember(GLIDEIN_Site,UNDESIRED_Sites,",")) && (isUndefined(TARGET.ProjectName) != True && TARGET.ProjectName != "") && (ifThenElse(JobDurationCategory =!= undefined && JobDurationCategory == "Long", GLIDEIN_ToDie - CurrentTime >= 144000, GLIDEIN_Max_Walltime =?= undefined || GLIDEIN_Max_Walltime < 43200 || GLIDEIN_ToDie - CurrentTime >= 36000))

job.comment: Define job constraint and schedds globally for simplicity, on CHTC, only count jobs which wants glideins

match.start_expr: (TARGET.ITB_Sites =!= True) && (TARGET.ITB_Factory =!= True) && (isUndefined(RequestGPUs) || RequestGPUs == 0) && (isUndefined(TARGET.SingularityImage) || SINGULARITY_START_CLAUSE) && ((SlotType == "Dynamic") || (TARGET.RequestMemory < (TARGET.RequestCPUs * 4 * MY.TotalMemory / MY.TotalCpus)) || (My.Memory > 100000))

job.query_expr: isUndefined(RequiresWholeMachine) && (ITB_Sites =!= True) && (ITB_Factory =!= True) && isUndefined(RequiresLongWalltime) && isUndefined(RequiresBigMem) && (isUndefined(RequestGPUs) || RequestGPUs == 0)

group.name: spt-osgvo
group.comment: SPT dedicated resources, but under OSG VO

group.name: spt-osgvo-highmem
group.comment: SPT dedicated resources, but under OSG VO

group.name: xenon
group.comment: Using a XENON credential to submit under that XENON1T VO instead of the OSG VO
